## 2025-10-08

## Changes

Improves SwiftUI support for Transact
- Added `onInteraction`, `onDataRequest`, `onAuthStatusUpdates`, `onTaskStatusUpdate`, `onLaunch`, `onError` to the SwiftUI API
- Added support for running actions from a SwiftUI view hierarchy

### Products

- Deposit
- Switch
- Manage

### Requirements

| Name | Version | 
| ---- | ----  |
| Xcode | >= 16 | 
| iOS | >= 13 | 

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/atomicfi/ios-sdk/compare/3.20.7...3.21.0
